textTemplates.name: SubjectAMSDAN
textTemplates.text: File AMS/ACI/AFR before the deadline (Docs HCM)/Check matched (if any)

textTemplates.name: SubjectBookingProcessDAN
textTemplates.text: Get booking confirmation (from pricing)/Cus-Send booking info customer confirm

textTemplates.name: SubjectDebitDAN
textTemplates.text: Send Debit note to the customer for confirming/Make payment to the carrier

textTemplates.name: SubjectDoubleCheckDAN
textTemplates.text: Check if the carrier received payment/Check if we received the payment from the customer/Check if the shipper, customer, and carrier released the bill/Check if MBL released & HBL released

textTemplates.name: SubjectSubmitSIDAN
textTemplates.text: Issue HBL and send HBL to the customer to confirm
